oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Virginia Union veterans medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Posthumous medal of Pvt. James Earl, Co. G, 14th W. Va. Inf. Regt., USA who contracted measles and died in camp in Clarksburg, West Virginia. He was the future father-in-law of Wesley McDonald of Co. E, 6th W. Va. Inf. Regt., USA. Such medals were awarded by the West Virginia General Assembly to Union veterans who served from that state.
